doc.title: The ABC Fall Preview Special: An All New Season Inspired by Bob Patterson
doc.plot: This Fall, it's an all new season on ABC...inspired by the biggest stars...and the best new shows... Take a sneak-peek at the all new ABC Fall lineup, and most importantly, answer the question "Who is Bob Patterson and why is everyone talking about him?" The Number Three Self-Help Guru in the Nation is taking an all new season to the top. The best new shows...the hottest stars...and Bob Patterson...Definitely ABC.
